problems.title: Count Substrings with Same First and Last Character
problems.description:
Count the number of substrings in a given string that have the same first and last character. Print the count.

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print the count of substrings with same first and last character.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
aba

Sample Output
4

Sample Input
abc

Sample Output
3

Explanation:
For "aba": substrings are "a", "b", "a", "ab", "ba", "aba". Those with same first and last: "a", "a", "aba", "aba" = 4 (note: substring "aba" appears in multiple positions). Actually, for "aba": "a"(0-0), "b"(1-1), "a"(2-2), "aba"(0-2) = 4.
hintsList: For each starting position, check all substrings starting from that position. Count those where first and last characters match.
